text: "Tommy Gun" is a 1978 song by English punk rock band The Clash and is the leading single from their second studio album Give 'Em Enough Rope. It went to number 19 in the United Kingdom and didn't chart anywhere in the other countries chart. ==Track listing== All tracks written by Joe Strummer/Mick Jones. ; 7" vinyl # "Tommy Gun" – 3:18 # "1-2 Crush On You" – 2:59 ==References== Category:1978 songs Category:Punk rock songs Category:The Clash songs
title: Tommy Gun (song)
